Introduction
This topic contains information on developing for medical and lay evidence, including
VA examinations under
38 CFR 3.814
, and
38 CFR 3.815
, and
developing for medical evidence of
spina bifida under 38 CFR 3.814
, and
a covered birth defect under 38 CFR 3.815
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C - Eligibility and Development
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C
